title: IImportIgesData.CurvesAsSketches
description: Gets or sets whether the curves are imported as sketches or reference curve features.
returns: True to import curves as sketches, false to import curves as reference curve features
remarks:
IImportIgesData::IncludeCurves
must be set to true for this property to have an effect.
